pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa bhikkhunupassayaṃ nissāya yavakhettaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.3: Bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi khette chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.4: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uccārampi passāvampi saṅkārampi vighāsampi harite chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:1.15: “Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.12: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.14: pubbaṇṇaṃ aparaṇṇaṃ yaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.1.19: Sakiṃ āṇattā bahukampi chaḍḍeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.1: Harite haritasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.2: Harite vematikā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc9:2.2.3: Harite aharitasaññā chaḍḍeti vā chaḍḍāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
